block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This is Paper plane 13 of our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge. It's the Sky Cruiser by Michael LaFosse. This is simply a really cool looking plane and it flies really fast. If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 012 : Backwards Plane by Carlos Gonzalez Garcia", you could watch it at https://youtu.be/qnEFdbOXGXs Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art

block_list.title: More Designs from Michael G. LaFosse

  • Sky Cruiser by Michael LaFosse
